title: Ruby::Box: Rethinking Code Reloading with Isolated Namespaces
author: simi

og.title: Ruby::Box: Rethinking Code Reloading with Isolated Namespaces
og.description: Ruby's experimental Ruby::Box feature offers a fresh approach to code reloading - instead of tracking constants, just load code in isolation and discard it afterwards. Here's what it makes possible, and where it still needs work.

title: Ruby Butler: Time to Rethink RubyGems and Bundler
author: simi

og.title: Ruby Butler: It’s Time to Rethink RubyGems and Bundler
og.description: RubyGems and Bundler defined a generation of Ruby. But maybe it’s time to rethink them. Ruby Butler is my take — a fresh start, a new rb command, and a space to experiment again.

title: Introducing Wubular: Rubular Reimagined in Ruby+WASM
author: simi

og.title: Wubular: Rubular’s regex spirit, reborn with Ruby + WebAssembly
og.description: Rubular set the standard for regex testing in Ruby. With Ruby 3.2 bringing WebAssembly support, Wubular takes that idea into the browser — no servers, instant feedback, full privacy. It’s not just a remake, but a glimpse of what Ruby + WASM make possible for future apps.
